description: When Helene left little Effie followed her down the road, they had bonded so well! She was calm and gentle with Effie and gave her much affection during her stay. Helene was very good at communicating and sent me a message or two a day to say what Effie was up to. I'm happy that Helene will be coming again, as I'm sure Effie will be too when she finds out. Many thanks, Helene!

Hélène was a fabulous den and pet sitter.  She was absolutely able for Yoda who is a handful of a raccoon to care for.  Her calm and confident manner was reassuring and she is definitely very intuitive around complex animals such as Yoda.  
The den was spotless on my return with linen all washed and a happy, settled and well cared for raccoon to greet me. 
I would highly recommend HÃ©lÃ¨ne to come and care for your pets or den sit.  
The communication before and during the sit was prompt and informative and I felt highly reassured having HÃ©lÃ¨ne caring for Yoda.  
I would be delighted to have Helene come to my home anytime again and feel fortunate to have had her as a sitter in my home caring for Yoda.

Helene was a fantastic and very trusted den and pet sitter! She was great at communicating and was always extremely friendly and easygoing. 

It was our first time using the service so we were a bit nervous but we had no reason to be! Helene looked after our raccoons so well, they were happy and relaxed when we got home. 

She also went above and beyond by changing and washing the bed linen and left the den cleaner than when she arrived which was amazing! 

I would highly recommend Helene and would be more than happy for her to come sit for us again!

It was a pleasure to welcome Helene back for another sit. She looked after my home and raccoons extremely well and left the den really lovely and tidy and clean.    She is very reliable and I look forward to her sitting again for me in the future.    Thanks so much!

Hèléne was a great Housesitter, easygoing and attentive towards the raccoons. One of our  raccoons goes through fussy eating periods, he finally he came round to Helene being in the den and chilled out! 
Helene kept the place clean and tidy, and we felt good that the den and raccoons were in good handsâ€¦ would totally like to have her stay again.. (if she wants:0)

Helene was an excellent housesitter. She was very flexible when I needed to add a few extra days, kept in touch regularly and came to meet me before the sit.       She looked after my  home and pets extremely well and was a pleasure to get to know.     I would definitely recommend her for future sits and am hopeful that she might be able to sit for me again in the future.   Thanks so much Helene!

HÃ©lÃ¨ne was a great pet and den sitter for us whilst we were away.

Our plans were a bit last minute and we ended up returning a day earlier than planned, but she was very understanding and flexible which made everything a lot less stressful!  

We received regular updates about how our little Rio was doing and he seemed very content when we returned after our trip. The flat was also spotless, with the bed stripped and sheets already washed for us, which was a dream. She even left a bottle of rosÃ© in the fridge for us which was extremely thoughtful and very much appreciated!

Thank you so much for looking after Rio and the flat for us- we hope you enjoyed your stay :)
Helene is amazing! Really great with communication and wonderful with our raccoon Maisie. The apartment was spotless when we got back. Thank you!

Helene was AMAZING! My poor kitty managed to hurt himself on the last day of her sit & she was super calm, contacted me & got everything ready for the vet. She kept him extremely happy the whole time & gave him all the cuddles he needed :) My den was spotless as well, she definitely went above & beyond - Iâ€™m sure it was cleaner than when I left! Plus she was happy to stay an extra night when I realised Iâ€™d got my dates wrong, so flexible & nice to deal with. Helene is a person is lovely to chat to. She updated me during the stay & just got on with with it without needing to ask much. Big big thanks from me xx

Helene was a fantastic den & pet sitter. Our raccoon Maria was very happy when we returned. So were we, because our flat was left spotless - Helene had obviously gone the extra mile to help too by washing bedding and leaving us raccoon-friendly flowers for our return. It was lovely. We felt very confident leaving Maria in Helene's capable hands and received regular updates about how Maria was doing, which we loved.  Thank you Helene!
reply: Dear Hannah and dear Luke, It was a pleasure looking after little Maria who is just adorable! Thanks for the lovely review! With warm regards.  HÃ©lÃ¨ne
